name: Actions at the top of the menu [Stylish:Chrome]
description: Don't install this - it won't do a thing until the next update of Stylish for Chrome. Then, it will only work for Stylish for Chrome. Moves the "Find styles", "New style", and "Manage styles" links from the bottom of the popup menu to the top.
additional_info: The positioning isn't perfect. The "New style" link can be either 1 or 2 lines. Allowing room for two lines means a gap below these links when "New style" is only 1 line high.
